metadata.Name: Arap-Tweet
metadata.Description: Arap-Tweet is a large multi-dialect Twitter corpus for gender, age and language variety identification.
metadata.Paper Title: Arap-Tweet: A Large Multi-Dialect Twitter Corpus for Gender, Age and Language Variety Identification
metadata.Venue Name: Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
Affiliations: Zewail City of Science and Technology
metadata.Abstract: Social media platforms, particularly Twitter, have become a rich source of data for various Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks. However, the linguistic diversity of Arabic poses a significant challenge for building robust and generalizable models. In this paper, we present Arap-Tweet, a large-scale multi-dialect Twitter corpus annotated with gender, age, and language variety information. The corpus comprises over 1.8 million tweets collected from various Arabic-speaking regions. We provide a detailed analysis of the corpus, including dialect distribution, gender and age ratios, and linguistic characteristics. We also evaluate the performance of state-of-the-art models on several downstream tasks, demonstrating the effectiveness of Arap-Tweet for Arabic dialectal NLP. The dataset is publicly available to facilitate further research in this area.
